{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Gimilzagar | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation=[[King's Men]] | language=[[Adûnaic]] | birth={{SA|2630}}{{UT|5a}}, Note 12 | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Elros]] | parentage=[[Tar-Calmacil]] | siblings=[[Tar-Ardamin]]{{UT|Kings}}, entry XIX ''Tar-Ardamin'' | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Gimilzagar''' was the second son of [[Tar-Calmacil]]. He was an ancestor of [[Inzilbêth]], the mother of [[Tar-Palantir]]. ==Etymology== ''Gimilzagar'' is an [[Adûnaic]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it likely means "Sword of Stars", being a compound of ''[[gimil]]'' ("stars") + ''[[zagar]]'' ("sword").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=http://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-2196697131.html|articlename=Ad.
